query.q: rdfs_individual_of(I, knowrob:'CRAMAction'), rdf_has(I, knowrob:'taskContext', literal(type(_,'GRASP'))), rdf_has(I, knowrob:'startTime', T0), rdf_has(I, knowrob:'endTime', T1), visualize_chemlab_scene(T0), add_trajectory('/r_gripper_palm_link', T0, T1, 0.1).
query.text: What was the right gripper trajectory during GRASP actions?

query.q: rdfs_individual_of(Task, knowrob:'CRAMAction'), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'taskContext', literal(type(_,'GOAL-UNSCREWED'))), findall(_Type, (subtask(Task, _Sub), rdfs_individual_of(_Sub, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), rdf_has(_Sub, knowrob:'perceptionRequest', _Desig), mng_designator(_Desig, _DesigJava), mng_designator_props(_Desig, _DesigJava, ['TYPE'], _Type)), Types), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'startTime', T), visualize_chemlab_scene(T), visualize_chemlab_highlights(Types).
query.text: Which were the objects unscrewing was performed on?

query.q: rdfs_individual_of(Task, knowrob:'CRAMAction'), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'taskContext', literal(type(_,'GOAL-SCREWED'))), findall(_Type, (subtask(Task, _Sub), rdfs_individual_of(_Sub, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), rdf_has(_Sub, knowrob:'perceptionRequest', _Desig), mng_designator(_Desig, _DesigJava), mng_designator_props(_Desig, _DesigJava, ['TYPE'], _Type)), Types), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'startTime', T), visualize_chemlab_scene(T), visualize_chemlab_highlights(Types).
query.text: Which were the objects screwing was performed on?

query.q: rdfs_individual_of(Task, knowrob:'CRAMAction'), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'taskContext', literal(type(_,'GOAL-LOADED-PIPETTE-TIP'))), rdf_has(Prev, knowrob:'nextAction', Task), subtask(Prev, _Sub), rdfs_individual_of(_Sub, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), rdf_has(_Sub, knowrob:'perceptionRequest', _Desig), mng_designator(_Desig, _DesigJava), mng_designator_props(_Desig, _DesigJava, ['TYPE'], Type), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'startTime', T), visualize_chemlab_scene(T), visualize_chemlab_highlight(Type).
query.text: Which was the tool you used for pipetting action?
